perturbation.original_text: F. “Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: F. “Licensed Products” shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products’ affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company *may* be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period. Amendments to this agreement can be approved by majority vote of the parties. For purposes of clarity in this agreement, amendments can be approved by simple electronic mail from an authorized representative of each party.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition strictly requires a written amendment signed by all parties to add new Licensed Products. The modified version allows for new products to be added without requiring all parties' signatures and permits email approval, creating a direct contradiction. The original requires written and signed amendments, the modified version allows for email approvals, leading to uncertainty about how products are officially added and potential disputes.

perturbation.original_text: A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: A *potential* donation of $0.05 per Unit *potentially* sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory *potentially* payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts *may* be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter *when possible* beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and *may* continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition mandates a donation of $0.05 per unit sold. The modified version makes it a potential or optional donation, creating a direct contradiction. The original requires a donation, the modified version makes it optional, leading to uncertainty about if donations will be made.
